Mirai of the Future directed by Mamoru Hosoda. Having enjoyed most of his works especially like The Girl Who Leapt Through Time or The Boy and the beast a lot I had quite a high anticipation for this film and a lso excited to see how he would direct the next film. However it just disappointed me in some points : mostly the plot that is basically about the very selfish naughty boy who has yet to learn the important of appreciations to his parents and people around him Although It â€™ s no wonder he doesnâ€™t understand it at all coz I used to be like him when I was his age maybe ), I feel that this film should have contained more other essential stuff to enlighten kids who watch this movie as an audience as opposed to showing this naughty kid causing lots of trouble that however lead him to understand the appreciation to parents for bringing up him eventually Still there should be more things to get focused on during this entire film I suppose it doesnâ€™t mean we don â€™ t get anything from this movie at all we learn how hard it is for parents to raise children as they hope to So most parents would be able to sympathise with t he parents in some aspects I guess but I have never been a parent before so it might have discouraged us to have kids maybe lol But I as always like the visuals with really good animations That â€™ s a goody thing about Japanese anime I guess Cheers.
